actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to eliminate a restriction relating to certain lands granted to the State of Montana.

summary.text: Eliminates any restrictions on the disposal of specified lands by the State of Montana to the city of Deer Lodge, Montana. Stipulates that the buildings and lands affected be used only for the purpose of preserving their cultural, historic, educational, or recreational value for the general public.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate a restriction relating to certain lands granted to the State of Montana.
